GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows updates to vote counts based on the input data and returns the article affected by the update, showing the changes to it

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows posting a new comment to an article using article_id, shows the posted comment when successful
